Title: Description
Creator Profile Customization: Creators can customize their profile pages to reflect their unique style and brand.

Creator Profile Customization: Description

Title: Showcase Talent
Creator Profile Customization: As a music collaborator, I want to effectively showcase my musical talent on the platform so that I can attract the attention of record labels and brands.
Unnamed: 2: Allows the user to highlight their skills and creativity, increasing their chances of being discovered by industry professionals.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should provide a user-friendly interface for uploading and sharing music tracks, videos, and other media.The platform should allow users to create a comprehensive profile with information about their musical background, influences, and achievements.The platform should have a rating and review system for users to provide feedback on each other's work.

Title: Discover New Music
Creator Profile Customization: As a music collaborator, I want to discover new music and talent on the platform so that I can be inspired and potentially collaborate with other artists.
Unnamed: 2: Allows the user to explore and appreciate different genres, styles, and emerging artists, fostering creativity and potential collaborations.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should have a recommendation system that suggests new music and artists based on the user's preferences and listening history.The platform should provide curated playlists, charts, or featured sections to highlight new and popular music.The platform should allow users to follow and connect with artists whose work they admire.

Title: Find Suitable Creators
Creator Profile Customization: As a content production manager, I want to easily find creators with the right skills and experience for content production projects.
Unnamed: 2: Saves time and effort in searching for suitable creators.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should have a search and filter functionality to narrow down creators based on skills, experience, and location.Creators' profiles should include detailed information about their skills, experience, and past projects.The platform should provide recommendations of creators based on project requirements.

Title: Creator Profile Customization
Creator Profile Customization: As a content production manager, I want creators to have the ability to customize their profiles.
Unnamed: 2: Allows creators to showcase their unique style and personality.
Unnamed: 3: The platform should provide options for creators to customize their profile layout, colors, and fonts.Creators should be able to add a bio, social media links, and other personal details to their profiles.The platform should provide preview and editing options for creators to see how their profile looks.

Title: Title
Creator Profile Customization: Description

Title: Input Requirements: Profile Customization Options
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should have options to customize their profile layout, colors, and fonts.

Title: Input Requirements: Profile Information
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should be able to add a bio, social media links, and other personal details to their profiles.

Title: Processing Requirements: Profile Customization Preview
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should have preview and editing options to see how their profile looks.

Title: Output Requirements: Customized Profile Layout
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should display the customized profile layout for each creator.

Title: Output Requirements: Profile Information Display
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should display the bio, social media links, and other personal details on each creator's profile.

Title: Output Requirements: Profile Customization Preview Display
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should display the preview of the customized profile layout for creators.

Title: User Interface Requirements: Profile Customization Options
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should provide user-friendly options for creators to customize their profile layout, colors, and fonts.

Title: User Interface Requirements: Profile Information Input
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should provide user-friendly input fields for creators to add their bio, social media links, and other personal details to their profiles.

Title: User Interface Requirements: Profile Customization Preview
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should provide a user-friendly preview and editing interface for creators to see how their profile looks.

Title: Business Rules: Profile Customization Options
Creator Profile Customization: Only registered creators should have access to profile customization options.
Unnamed: 6: Only registered creators can access profile customization options.

Title: Business Rules: Profile Information
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should have the ability to update their profile information at any time.
Unnamed: 6: Creators can update their profile information.

Title: Business Rules: Profile Customization Preview
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should be able to preview and make changes to their profile customization before saving.
Unnamed: 6: Creators can preview and edit their profile customization.

Title: Title
Creator Profile Customization: Description

Title: Data Privacy Compliance
Creator Profile Customization: The platform must comply with data privacy regulations, such as GDPR, to ensure the protection of user data and obtain proper consent for data processing.

Title: Secure Payment Processing
Creator Profile Customization: The platform must adhere to industry standards for secure payment processing, including encryption of sensitive financial information and compliance with Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS).

Title: Intellectual Property Rights Management
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should provide mechanisms to protect and manage intellectual property rights, ensuring that content creators have control over their work and preventing unauthorized use or distribution.

Title: Transparency in Sponsorship Deals
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should provide transparent reporting and disclosure of sponsorship deals, including details of financial arrangements and any potential conflicts of interest, to maintain trust and comply with advertising and disclosure regulations.

Title: Age Verification and COPPA Compliance
Creator Profile Customization: If the platform allows users under the age of 13, it must comply with the Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (COPPA) and implement age verification mechanisms to obtain parental consent for data collection and processing.

Title: Fast Profile Page Loading
Creator Profile Customization: When a user visits a creator's profile page, it should load within 2 seconds to provide a smooth browsing experience.

Title: Efficient Media Loading
Creator Profile Customization: Images and videos on creator profile pages should load within 3 seconds to maintain user engagement and interest.

Title: Real-time Collaboration Updates
Creator Profile Customization: When multiple creators are collaborating on a project, the system should update project status and changes in real-time (within 1 second) to ensure smooth collaboration.

Title: Quick Search for Creators
Creator Profile Customization: When searching for creators based on specific criteria (e.g., genre, location), search results should load within 3 seconds, even during peak usage times.

Title: Fast Sign-up and Login Process
Creator Profile Customization: The sign-up and login process for creators, record labels, and brands should take no longer than 5 seconds to provide a seamless onboarding experience.

Title: Secure User Authentication
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should implement strong authentication mechanisms, such as multi-factor authentication, to ensure that only authorized users can access their accounts and perform actions on the platform.

Title: Data Encryption
Creator Profile Customization: Sensitive data, such as user profiles and sponsorship deals, should be encrypted both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access or interception.

Title: Access Control
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should have granular access control mechanisms to ensure that only authorized individuals, such as record labels and brands, can view and sign creators for sponsorship deals.

Title: Secure Communication Channels
Creator Profile Customization: All communication channels within the platform, including messaging and file sharing, should be encrypted to prevent eavesdropping or tampering.

Title: Protection against Account Hijacking
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should implement measures to detect and prevent unauthorized access to user accounts, such as account lockouts after multiple failed login attempts and notification of suspicious login activities.

Title: Secure Storage of Media Content
Creator Profile Customization: Media content uploaded by creators should be securely stored to prevent unauthorized access or leakage of intellectual property.

Title: Scalable User Profile Storage
Creator Profile Customization: As the number of creators and users grows, the system should be able to handle the increased storage requirements for user profile data without compromising performance or functionality.

Title: Efficient Search and Filtering of Creator Profiles
Creator Profile Customization: As the number of creators on the platform increases, the system should be able to efficiently search and filter through a large number of creator profiles, ensuring quick retrieval of relevant results.

Title: Horizontal Scalability for Increased Traffic
Creator Profile Customization: As the platform gains popularity and experiences increased traffic, the system should be able to horizontally scale by adding more servers or resources to handle the increased load and maintain optimal performance.

Title: Optimized Media Streaming for Creator Content
Creator Profile Customization: Creators may upload and share media content such as videos and music. The system should ensure scalable media streaming capabilities to provide a seamless experience for users, even during peak usage periods.

Title: Scalable Integration with Third-Party APIs
Creator Profile Customization: The platform may need to integrate with various third-party APIs for features such as social media sharing, analytics, or payment gateways. The system should be designed to easily scale and accommodate multiple API integrations without performance degradation.

Title: Integration with Social Media APIs
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should integrate with social media APIs (such as Instagram, YouTube) to allow creators to import their content and followers, and to enable brands and record labels to view creators' profiles and engagement metrics.

Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms, such as OAuth 2.0, to ensure that only authorized users (creators, brands, record labels) can access and modify the platform's data and functionalities.

Title: Real-time Content Synchronization
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should provide real-time synchronization of content updates between creators' profiles and external platforms (such as social media channels), ensuring that the latest content is always displayed on the platform.

Title: API Rate Limiting
Creator Profile Customization: The platform should implement API rate limiting to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage of the platform's APIs by external integrations, such as third-party applications or services.

Title: Data Encryption in Transit and at Rest
Creator Profile Customization: All data transmitted between the platform and external integrations should be encrypted using secure protocols (such as HTTPS) to protect the confidentiality and integrity of the data. Additionally, data at rest should be encrypted to prevent unauthorized access.

Title: Customizable Profile Design
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should be able to easily customize the design and layout of their profile pages to reflect their unique style and brand.

Title: Intuitive Profile Customization
Creator Profile Customization: The profile customization process should be intuitive and user-friendly, allowing creators to easily make changes to their profile without requiring technical expertise.

Title: Responsive Profile Design
Creator Profile Customization: The profile pages should be designed to be responsive and adapt to different screen sizes and devices, ensuring a consistent and optimal user experience across platforms.

Title: Preview and Preview Profile Changes
Creator Profile Customization: Creators should be able to preview their profile changes before applying them, allowing them to see how their profile will look to others and make any necessary adjustments.

Title: Accessible Profile Customization
Creator Profile Customization: The profile customization features should be accessible to users with disabilities, following accessibility guidelines and providing alternative options for users who may have difficulty with certain customization elements.

Title: High Availability of Creator Profile Customization
Creator Profile Customization: The system should ensure that the Creator Profile Customization feature is highly available, with a target uptime of 99.99%, to allow creators to continuously customize their profile pages without interruptions.

Title: Data Integrity of Customized Profiles
Creator Profile Customization: The system should maintain the integrity of customized profiles, ensuring that any changes made by creators are accurately saved and displayed on their profile pages.

Title: Fast Response Time for Profile Customization
Creator Profile Customization: The system should provide a fast response time for profile customization actions, such as uploading profile pictures, updating bio information, and adding media files, to enhance the user experience and encourage creators to engage with the platform.

Title: Backup and Recovery of Customization Data
Creator Profile Customization: The system should perform regular backups of customization data, including profile settings, media files, and customization history, to ensure that creators' customization efforts are not lost in the event of system failures or data corruption. The recovery process should be efficient and have a Recovery Point Objective (RPO) of less than 24 hours.

Title: Secure Storage of Customization Data
Creator Profile Customization: The system should securely store all customization data, including profile settings, media files, and customization history, to protect creators' intellectual property and personal information from unauthorized access or data breaches.
